author: Source: Pontefract and Castleford Express
title: TalkTalk data breach: What you need to know - Pontefract and Castleford Express
text:
Mobile phone and broadband provider TalkTalk has become a victim of a "significant and sustained cyber attack" which could have led to breaches of customers' personal and financial details. The company said it was "too early to say" how many of its four million UK customers had been affected by the attack and the Metropolitan Police are investigating.
Start the conversation, or Read more at Pontefract and Castleford Express.
